tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE on_chain_data (
    block_height INT,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR,
    sender_address VARCHAR,
    receiver_address VARCHAR,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE OnChainData (
    BlockNumber INT,
    TransactionHash VARCHAR(255),
    SenderAddress VARCHAR(255),
    ReceiverAddress VARCHAR(255),
    Amount DECIMAL(18, 6),
    Timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE MarketInsights (
    Timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    MarketPrice DECIMAL(18, 6),
    MarketCap DECIMAL(18, 6),
    TradingVolume DECIMAL(18, 6),
    ActiveAddresses INT,
    TrendAnalysis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tx_hash VARCHAR(255),
    block_number INT,
    from_address VARCHAR(255),
    to_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(18, 6)
);

CREATE TABLE Blocks (
    block_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    num_transactions INT,
    block_hash VARCHAR(255),
    miner_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Addresses (
    address VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
    balance DECIMAL(18, 6),
    total_transactions INT,
    first_transaction TIMESTAMP,
    last_transaction TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE on_chain_data (
    block_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(18, 6) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_number INT NOT NULL,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(18, 6) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE on_chain_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    block_number INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    from_address TEXT,
    to_address TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE token_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    token_id UUID,
    from_address TEXT,
    to_address TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
